segments.text: Sunday papers . I usually read them after coming back home from our company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As you know , I am a sports fan . And these papers are famous for their sports section . So I will feel relaxed after grasping some information I am interested in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got your meaning . Reading is your own solution to solve pressure from busy tasks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I often go to the bar near our dorm when I am overtired . I am crazy for drinking wines with special taste .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall we have a drink someday ?
segments.speaker: S1
